participant_1.background:
I own my company.
I barely show up to work.
I make ask a year.
I am married with one child.
I pay my employees minimum wage.

participant_2.background:
My name is frank.
I am the general manager of the local grocery store.
My hobbies include reading and cycling.

content.text: Hi Frank, what do you do for a living?
Hi! I'm the general manager of the local grocery store.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in working in the grocery industry.
It's a lot of fun! I get to meet new people all the time.
Yeah, I can imagine. Do you have any advice for someone who's looking to get into the industry?
Sure, the most important thing is to be friendly and helpful. Customers appreciate it when you go out of your way to help them.
That makes sense. I'm sure I'd be good at that.
I'm sure you would! What other interests do you have?
I love reading and cycling.
That's great! I'm also an avid reader. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all sorts of books, but I'm especially interested in history and science.
I love history books too! I'm always fascinated by learning about the past.
Me too! It's so interesting to see how things have changed over time.
I agree. So, what's your favorite book?
It's hard to say, but I'd have to go with "A Brief History of Time" by Stephen Hawking.
That's a great book! I read it a few years ago and it really changed my perspective on the universe.
Me too! It's amazing to think about how vast and complex the universe is.
I agree. It's mind-boggling.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, cycle, and play video games.
That sounds like fun! I love to read and play video games too.
We should do something together sometime!
I'd love that! What do you have in mind?
We could go to the library and check out some books, or we could go to the game store and see if there are any new games we'd like to play.
Both of those sound great! I'm free this weekend if you want to do something.
I'm free too! I'll text you tomorrow and we can figure out what we want to do.
Sounds good!
